nodes.text: The Galanx Casino was a casino situated in the city of Canto Bight, containing a fathier racetrack. Alfar Sholt, an owner of numerous casinos, was assassinated by the sniper Just Lucky on a job from the Sixth Kin criminal organization while spectating a fathier race at the Galanx Casino. Following the assassination, Lucky exited through the casino interior from an area that was under construction.
